title: Air Products and Chemicals ' sales 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 9674.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 7504.0 was reached at Year 2016
